11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.actions;
12  
13  import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
14  
15  import javax.swing.text.JTextComponent;
16  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
17  
18  import org.netbeans.api.editor.EditorActionRegistration;
19  import org.netbeans.editor.BaseAction;
20  import org.openide.util.NbBundle;
21  
22  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterAdvice;
23  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterStrategyDispatcher;
24  
25  /**
26   * Registration analog to
27   * http://hg.netbeans.org/jet-main/file/01c13d4da2da/java.hints/src/org/netbeans/modules/java/hints/OrganizeMembers.java
28   *
29   * @author markiewb
30   * @author bahlef
31   */
32  @NbBundle.Messages({ "external-format=Format" })
33  @EditorActionRegistration(category = "Source", name = FormatAction.MACRONAME, menuPath = "Source", menuPosition = 299, menuText = "#external-format", popupPath = "", popupPosition = 1599, popupText = "#external-format")
34  public class FormatAction extends BaseAction {
35  	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
36  
37  	public static final String MACRONAME = "external-format";
38  
39  	@Override
40  	public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e, JTextComponent component) {
41  		if (component == null || !component.isEditable() || !component.isEnabled()) {
42  			return;
43  		}
44  
45  		int start = component.getSelectionStart();
46  		int end = component.getSelectionEnd();
47  		int caret = component.getCaretPosition();
48  
49  		final StyledDocument document = (StyledDocument) component.getDocument();
50  
51  		FormatterStrategyDispatcher.getInstance().format(new FormatterAdvice(document, start, end, caret, component));
52  	}
53  }
